list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor CSS imports and simplify className usage.
Moved font import to the top of the CSS file for clarity. Replaced template literals with the `cn` utility for cleaner and more consistent handling of conditional classNames in the Header component. Reduced inline class definition redundancy for better readability.

task.summary:
Remove unused files and update dependencies
Deleted `page.js` and `jsconfig.json` as they are no longer necessary. Updated `package-lock.json` to include additional dependencies such as `@hookform/resolvers`, `react-hook-form`, and others for enhanced functionality. Ensured the build setup aligns with current project requirements.

"Refactor and implement core features for announcements and auth"
This commit removes unused files, streamlines folder structure, and introduces new features for announcements, products, and enhanced authentication. Features include fetching data with server actions, reusable components like `Breadcrumb` and `AnnouncementBanner`, Zustand-based auth store, and E2E auth tests. These changes modernize the app's architecture and improve core functionalities.

Add footer, enhance homepage, and improve button styles
Implemented a new footer with improved UX and branding. Enhanced the homepage layout with updated hero and collections sections, added animations, and visual effects. Updated button styles to improve clarity, consistency, and responsiveness.

Refactor CSS imports and simplify className usage.
Moved font import to the top of the CSS file for clarity. Replaced template literals with the `cn` utility for cleaner and more consistent handling of conditional classNames in the Header component. Reduced inline class definition redundancy for better readability.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove `jsconfig.json` and add project setup files.
Deleted `jsconfig.json` as it's no longer needed. Added project-specific configuration files: `.claude-session`, `.idea/.gitignore`, `.shipspec/active-loop.local.json`, `CLAUDE.md`, and `docs/DESIGN-SYSTEM.md` to document and standardize the project setup and design system.

Remove unused files and update dependencies
Deleted `page.js` and `jsconfig.json` as they are no longer necessary. Updated `package-lock.json` to include additional dependencies such as `@hookform/resolvers`, `react-hook-form`, and others for enhanced functionality. Ensured the build setup aligns with current project requirements.

"Refactor and implement core features for announcements and auth"
This commit removes unused files, streamlines folder structure, and introduces new features for announcements, products, and enhanced authentication. Features include fetching data with server actions, reusable components like `Breadcrumb` and `AnnouncementBanner`, Zustand-based auth store, and E2E auth tests. These changes modernize the app's architecture and improve core functionalities.

Add footer, enhance homepage, and improve button styles
Implemented a new footer with improved UX and branding. Enhanced the homepage layout with updated hero and collections sections, added animations, and visual effects. Updated button styles to improve clarity, consistency, and responsiveness.

Refactor CSS imports and simplify className usage.
Moved font import to the top of the CSS file for clarity. Replaced template literals with the `cn` utility for cleaner and more consistent handling of conditional classNames in the Header component. Reduced inline class definition redundancy for better readability.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
